code:
name = "nexus-nair"
main = "src/index.js"
compatibility_date = "2024-12-12"
account_id = "ad41fcfe1a84b27c62cc5cc9d590720e"

[vars]
ENVIRONMENT = "production"
PULSE_INTERVAL = "9000"
CARE_PERCENTAGE = "0.15"
GRAIN_PRECISION = "0.01"

[[d1_databases]]
binding = "DB"
database_name = "nexus_nair_40d"
database_id = "YOUR_D1_DATABASE_ID"

[[r2_buckets]]
binding = "VAULT_STORAGE"
bucket_name = "nexus-vault-mesh"

[[kv_namespaces]]
binding = "NEXUS_KV"
id = "YOUR_KV_NAMESPACE_ID"

[build]
command = "npm run build"

[site]
bucket = "./dist"

[[routes]]
pattern = "fruitfulglobalplanet.com/*"
zone_name = "fruitfulglobalplanet.com"

name = "buildnest-orchestrator"
main = "src/index.ts"
compatibility_date = "2024-11-01"
account_id = "ad41fcfe1a84b27c62cc5cc9d590720e"

# KV Namespace for build metadata
[[kv_namespaces]]
binding = "BUILDNEST_KV"
id = "44b81a3e54fb4099ad3139b0024a7342"

# R2 Bucket for file storage
[[r2_buckets]]
binding = "HOTSTACK_BUCKET"
bucket_name = "hotstack-intake-bucket"

# Routes
[[routes]]
pattern = "buildnest-orchestrator.heynsschoeman.workers.dev/*"
zone_name = "heynsschoeman.workers.dev"

[vars]
LICENSEVAULT_URL = "https://license-vault-sepia.vercel.app"
SYSTEM_VERSION = "4.0-unified"

bucket_name = "hotstack-storage"
